title: Kim Kardashian flaunts impressive figure in SKIMS after Kanye West tells her she dresses 'too sexy'
text:
Kim Kardashian West recently had a disagreement with husband Kanye after her told her she dressed 'too sexy.'

But hubby's disapproving remarks won't stop her from serving her signature Kardashian curves as usual.

She took to Instagram Monday in a busty display as she showed off her new SKIMS line.

Busty display: Kim Kardashian West took to Instagram Monday in a busty display as she showed off her new SKIMS line

The 38-year-old sat on the floor in the Polaroid as she sported a grey bra with matching joggers.

She was promoting the shapewear line's cotton collection, which drops Tuesday on the website.

Kim has recently been promoting the collection, which is inspired by the underwear and clothing she likes to lounge in.

Departing from the brand's typical evening wear undergarments, the new collection consists of jersey underwear, tank tops, t-shirts and other leisurewear.

Cotton collection: She was promoting the shapewear line's cotton collection, which drops Tuesday on the website

Lazy vibes: Kim has recently been promoting the collection, which is inspired by the underwear and clothing she likes to lounge in

Cozy chic: Departing from the brand's typical evening wear undergarments, the new collection consists of jersey underwear, tank tops, t-shirts and other leisurewear

In this week's episode of Keeping Up with the Kardashians, she and Kanye exchanged words over her Met Gala look from May.

Kim turned heads in her skintight Thierry Mugler dress, which was a nod to Sophia Loren in the 1957 film Boy on a Dolphin.

The dress appeared to be dripping wet like in the film, when it was in fact dripping in jewels.

Met look: In this week's episode of Keeping Up with the Kardashians, she and Kanye exchanged words over her Met Gala look from May

Nod to Sophia: Kim turned heads in her skintight Thierry Mugler dress, which was a nod to Sophia Loren in the 1957 film Boy on a Dolphin

Dripping in jewels: The dress appeared to be dripping wet like in the film, when it was in fact dripping in jewels

The episode shows behind-the-scenes as Kim got ready for the exclusive event, from figuring out how to go to the bathroom to her disagreement with Kanye.

Having recently become a Christian figure with his Sunday Service, Kanye took a conservative stance on the look: 'You are my wife and it affects me when pictures are too sexy.'

But Kim stood her ground on the look: 'You built me up to be this sexy person and confidence and all this, and just because you’re on a journey and transformation doesn’t mean I’m in the same spot with you.'

Too sexy: Having recently become a Christian figure with his Sunday Service, Kanye took a conservative stance on the look: 'You are my wife and it affects me when pictures are too sexy'
description: Having recently become a Christian figure with his Sunday Service, Kanye took a conservative stance on her Met Gala look: 'You are my wife and it affects me when pictures are too sexy.'
